entries.title: How to Restore Our Dwindling Attention Spans
entries.description: Digital distractions are ramping up our natural tendency to shift focus, raising stress levels and hurting productivity. But we can still take control.

entries.title: ChatGPT Banned in New York City Public Schools Over Cheating Concerns
entries.description: Education officials said students could use the artificial-intelligence chatbot to do their schoolwork.

entries.title: Stair-Climbing Wheelchairs, Closed-Caption Glasses: Assistive Tech Gains at CES in Las Vegas
entries.description: Hardware to aid vision, hearing and mobility takes the stage at the technology bazaar.

entries.title: TikTok CEO Plans to Meet European Union Regulators
entries.description: Shou Zi Chew is heading to Brussels as the popular app faces heightened scrutiny in Washington over its Chinese ownership.

entries.title: U.S. EV Sales Jolted Higher in 2022 as Newcomers Target Tesla
entries.description: Electric-vehicle purchases jumped, with Ford and Hyundai-Kia gaining ground and Volkswagen and GM slipping.

entries.title: Tesla Slashes Prices in China Again After Deliveries Slump
entries.description: The company’s Model 3 is now more than 30% cheaper in China than in the U.S., as Tesla seeks to shore up its share of world’s largest auto market.

entries.title: Samsung Expects 69% Drop in Profit on Slumping Tech Demand
entries.description: High inflation and weak economies hit sales of memory chips and smartphones.
